top.title: Ukraine prepares new peace plan as Zelensky rules out giving up land
top.summary: Kyiv is seeking to resist a US push for a deal which would see territory handed over to Russia.

top.title: Dozens injured after magnitude 7.5 quake strikes northern Japan
top.summary: Authorities have warned that a stronger tremor could occur in the coming days.

top.title: Sudan air force bombing of towns, markets and schools has killed hundreds, report says
top.summary: A detailed study highlights the military's aerial campaign and how civilians have been its victims.

top.title: Trump gives Nvidia green light to sell advanced AI chips to China
top.summary: Nvidia had been at the centre of a geopolitical tug-of-war between the US and China in recent months.

top.title: Elon Musk's X bans European Commission from making ads after €120m fine
top.summary: The EU regulator had fined the social media platform over its "deceptive" blue tick badges.

top.title: Trump says $72bn Netflix-Warner Bros deal 'could be a problem'
top.summary: The planned deal would cement Netflix in its position as the world's biggest subscription streaming service.
